replies.msg:
Senate Majority Leader Chuck Schumer on Thursday vowed that the Senate would vote on the Bipartisan Background Checks Act of 2021, which passed the House Thursday in a 227-203 vote.

The US House of Reps just PASSED Biden-pushed gun control.

ğŸš¨PASSED banning private transfers
ğŸš¨PASSED giving govt bureaucrats power to indefinitely delay gun sales

We said it during the election & we’ll say it again: Biden wants to DISMANTLE the 2nd Amendment.

The U.S. passport card is issued by the federal government via the Department of State upon voluntary request. The primary purpose of the passport card is used as a Federal issued Identity card and a limited travel document under the Western Hemisphere Travel Initiative, similar to the usage of national identity cards in the Schengen Area.

The U.S. passport card is issued by the federal government via the Department of State upon voluntary request. The primary purpose of the passport card is used as a Federal issued Identity card and a limited travel document under the Western Hemisphere Travel Initiative, similar to the usage of national identity cards in the Schengen Area.
